description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to make any part of their body explode, from limbs to bodily secretions like mucus or breath, without harming themselves.

abilities.name: Explosion Generation
abilities.description: User can cause explosions from any part of their body including hair, limbs, breath, and bodily fluids.

abilities.name: Explosion Immunity
abilities.description: User is completely immune to all explosion-based attacks, including their own and external explosions.

techniques.name: Nose Fancy Cannon
techniques.description: User flicks dried nasal mucus that explodes on contact with tremendous destructive force.

techniques.name: Breeze Breath Bomb
techniques.description: User breathes into a pistol's chambers and fires invisible explosive air bullets that deliver substantial damage.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (seawater, Sea-Prism Stone)
weaknesses.description: Like all Devil Fruit users, becomes powerless when submerged in water or exposed to Sea-Prism Stone.
Explosions only activate upon the user's will; body parts don't explode automatically when touched.
Despite controlling explosions, the user lacks particular resistance to fire-based attacks.

keyMoments.description: Mr. 5 reveals his Bomu Bomu no Mi ability by using Nose Fancy Cannon against Miss Monday.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of the fruit's explosive capabilities and introduces the creative applications of the power.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to freely manipulate their body weight, ranging from 1 kilogram to 10,000 kilograms, without changing their physical size.

abilities.name: Weight Manipulation
abilities.description: User can change their body weight anywhere from 1 kg to 10,000 kg at will while maintaining normal size and appearance.

abilities.name: Enhanced Mobility
abilities.description: At 1 kg, user can float on the wind using an umbrella and maneuver through the air with great agility.

abilities.name: Crushing Force
abilities.description: At maximum weight, user can deliver devastating crushing attacks from above.

techniques.name: 10,000 Kilo Press
techniques.description: User reduces weight to 1 kg to float above the target, then rapidly increases to 10,000 kg to crush opponents below.

techniques.name: 10,000 Kilo Guillotine
techniques.description: Similar to Kilo Press but executed with an extended leg targeting the opponent's head or neck.

techniques.name: Crescendo Stone
techniques.description: A torture method where the user gradually increases weight in intervals to systematically crush immobilized targets.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (seawater, Sea-Prism Stone)
weaknesses.description: User becomes powerless when submerged in water or exposed to Sea-Prism Stone.
Weight change doesn't increase physical durability or resistance to attacks; user remains vulnerable despite heavy weight.
Once falling at heavy weight, user cannot alter their direction mid-fall.

weaknesses.weakness: Inferior to Ton Ton no Mi
weaknesses.description: The Ton Ton no Mi allows much greater maximum weight, making it a superior version of this ability.

keyMoments.description: Miss Valentine reveals and demonstrates her Kiro Kiro no Mi ability, showing her weight-manipulation powers.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the versatility of weight manipulation in combat and establishes Miss Valentine's fighting style.
